summary: Simple main menu replacer with lore friendly graphic.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.picshot.pl/pfiles/367290/tag.jpg[/img][/center]
_________
[color=orange]Changelog:[/color]
v1.0b
- Added optional version without Skyrim black logo,
_________
[color=green]Recommended:[/color]
Use with mod - Age of Aggression-Oppression - Main Menu Music by greed26
Age of Aggression-Oppression - Main Menu Music by greed26

_________
[color=red]Warning:[/color]
*Menu colors can be affected by mods like ENB which can cause main graphic to change colors, etc.
*Mod supports only 1920x1080 res.
